amendatorysection.catchline: Game and Parks State Park Improvement and Maintenance Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The Game and Parks State Park Improvement and Maintenance Fund is created. The fund shall consist of transfers made by the Legislature and any gifts, grants, bequests, or donations to the fund. Money in the fund shall be used to build, repair, renovate, rehabilitate, restore, modify, or improve any infrastructure in the state park system. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
